name: HH_PAT_CSMX_OTH_DX
description: This table contains case mix diagnoses information entered for a patient as part of a home health Outcome and Assessment Information Set (OASIS) assessment. The table stores values entered for M0246 for the Other diagnoses for the contact.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This column stores a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the contact date.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is populated only if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: CASE_MIX_DX1_OTH_ID
columns.description: This column stores the first Case Mix Diagnoses entered for the Other diagnoses as part of a home health assessment as defined by M0246.

columns.name: CASE_MIX_DX2_OTH_ID
columns.description: This column stores the second Case Mix Diagnoses entered for the Other diagnoses as part of a home health assessment as defined by M0246.
